description: This file defines the NotesDatabase class, a subclass of SQLiteOpenHelper, which manages the creation and upgrade of the notes database schema for the application. It includes SQL commands to create the notes table with relevant columns and indexes, and handles database version upgrades.

classes.name: NotesDatabase
classes.description: A helper class that manages SQLite database creation, version management, and schema setup for notes storage.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Creates the notes table and indexes when the database is first created.

methods.name: onUpgrade
methods.description: Handles database schema upgrades by dropping existing tables and recreating them.
